posts.title: About Me
posts.text: Iâ€™m a third-year PhD student in Computer Science at Case Western Reserve University. My research primarily focuses on the system security and blockchain security. Working Experience Research Intern, Palo Alto Networks, 05/2019 - 08/2019 Yelp Software Engineering Intern, 05/2018 - 08/2018 Pulications Graph Summarization on System Audit Logs for Attack Investigation [IEEE Security & Privacy 2022 Accepted] Back-Propagating System Dependency Impact for Attack Investigation [USENIX Security 2022 Accepted] Justitia: Towards a Blockchain-Assisted Online Judicial System[Under revision] ContractFix: A Framework for Automatically Fixing Vulnerabilities in Smart Contracts [Under revision]
